Title: In Sight Of The Lord (2)
Plot:
The Cold Case Squad discover that the victims were a group of friends who were all in the same army regiment during the war. 
It seems the murderer is killing as an act of revenge.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Clive Wood,  Christopher Tembey,  Hannah Jane Pawsey,  Alibe Parsons,  Andi Osho,  Andrew Obeney,  John Milroy,  Richard Mayes,  Jamie MacLachlan,  David Lloyd,  Kananu Kirimi,  Dave King,  Anna Jaskolka,  Emmanu
